duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide polite, friendly greetings and interactions with all guests.
Prepare product for sale (baking, weighing, and pricing).
Maintain product level, quality and freshness.
Maintain sanitation standards in the cooler, freezer, prep area and sales area.
Perform clerk function of cake decorating when requested.
Keep supply area neat, clean and tidy at all times.
Perform front end duties to insure 'no noticeable wait' standard is maintained.
Announce specials and sale info on the PA system.
Assist in product receiving and storage.
